long_description: The biodegradable Nathan Sport-Wash is a convenient replacement for regular laundry detergent and helps restore performance to your activewear. Sport-Wash is readily biodegradable and contains no bleach, fabric softener, brightener or scent; rinses out completely without leaving residue. Will not interfere with wicking capabilities, breathability, water repellency or insulation; use on cotton, nylon, polyester, microfiber and all synthetics. Restores factory-applied Durable Water Repellent finish; also helps restore loft and effectiveness to down and synthetic insulation. Nathan Sport-Wash laundry detergent removes odors, blood and grass stains; also helps prevent color fading. Penguin recommends using 1 fl. oz. per load; 42 fl. oz. bottle handles up to 42 loads of laundry.
short_description: The biodegradable Nathan Sport-Wash is a convenient replacement for regular laundry detergent and helps restore performance to your activewear.
